column4: Okay I am beyond frustrated now I still have no internet connection at all and now Network manager is gone
There is no NetworkManager icon - I can not access the internet with Ubuntu 10.04, it worked perfect last night
I did a bit of reading and add the ath0 line to some file I forgot....yes I have rebooted a ton of times
I'm new to ubuntu myself, so I'm trying to find out how the network manager starts itself.
and how do you enable it?
oer: yes that is what I edited
oer: it only had an lo line
mine only has lo, and iface lo inet loopback
Yeah, I guess I'm not much help.  I don't know the internals of ubuntu yet.
What does "service network-manager status" from a command line shell tell you?
